body_html:
Are there any compiled versions(maybe unofficial) for Windows without SSE4.3 requirement for older CPU?
I try compile from source but on my laptop it already takes 8 hours!
And still it didn't work because of another issue(#11203).

I think it is very desirable to have written those requirements in installation guide.

//edit: Did SSE4.3 even exists? I didn't find any information about it. So what is really required for proper funcion of PyTorch?

I try compile from source but on my laptop it already takes 8 hours!

body:
Are there any compiled versions(maybe unofficial) for Windows without SSE4.3 requirement for older CPU?
I try compile from source but on my laptop it already takes 8 hours!
And still it didn't work because of another issue(https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/11203).

I think it is very desirable to have written those requirements in installation guide.

//edit: Did SSE4.3 even exists? I didn't find any information about it. So what is really required for proper funcion of PyTorch?
